project.description: Regression/delta test for the LOFAR imaging pipeline. Triggers a build and test at midnight on changes in the trunk.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: # Perform svn steps needed before building if [ -f $WORKSPACE/LOFAR/CMakeLists.txt ] then echo "Found a previous checkout: updating"; svn up --depth files LOFAR else echo "not found a previous checkout: checkingout"; svn checkout --depth files https://svn.astron.nl/LOFAR/trunk LOFAR fi

# 1. A unit test cd gnu_debug ctest -R pipeline cd ..
# 2. set environment . /opt/cep/login/bashrc # allows usage of the use command use LofIm use Pythonlibs export PYTHONPATH=$WORKSPACE/install/lib/python2.6/dist-packages:$PYTHONPATH #
# 3. Remove old data rm -f $WORKSPACE/install/var/run/pipeline/trunk_imager_regression/statefile rm -f /data/lofar/testdata/CEP/Pipeline/imager_pipeline/trunk_regression.parset_feedback rm -rf /data/scratch/lofarbuild/trunk_imager_regression ssh lce069 "rm -rf /data/scratch/lofarbuild/trunk_imager_regression"
# 4. Create directory for logs and statefile mkdir -p $WORKSPACE/install/var/run/pipeline
# 5. run the pipeline cd $WORKSPACE/install/bin python msss_imager_pipeline.py /data/lofar/testdata/CEP/Pipeline/imager_pipeline/trunk_regression.parset -c $WORKSPACE/install/share/pipeline/pipeline.cfg --job trunk_imager_regression -d
# 4. Copy target data and the produced data to a scratch directory (on lce072) # a. copy target image data to the scratch directory mkdir /data/scratch/lofarbuild/trunk_imager_regression scp -r /data/lofar/testdata/CEP/Pipeline/imager_pipeline/data/image.restored_22_11_2012 /data/scratch/lofarbuild/trunk_imager_regression/image.restored.target scp -r lce069:/data/scratch/lofarbuild/trunk_imager_regression/awimage_cycle_0/image.restored /data/scratch/lofarbuild/trunk_imager_regression/image.restored
# b. copy target sourcelist to the scratch directory scp -r /data/lofar/testdata/CEP/Pipeline/imager_pipeline/data/bdsm_catalog_22_11_2012 /data/scratch/lofarbuild/trunk_imager_regression/bdsm_catalog.target scp -r lce069:/data/scratch/lofarbuild/trunk_imager_regression/awimage_cycle_0/bdsm_catalog /data/scratch/lofarbuild/trunk_imager_regression/bdsm_catalog
# c. Do actual comparison cd /data/scratch/lofarbuild/trunk_imager_regression python $WORKSPACE/LOFAR/CEP/Pipeline/test/regression_tests/imaging_pipeline.py bdsm_catalog bdsm_catalog.target image.restored image.restored.target 0.0002
